review_body: Great location close to everything clean and tidy nice pool and clean towels Shopping just down the road with an easy walk or take the bus...Waikiki beach shopping is also close enough to walk...Just love the fire works...

Restricted diets made kitchen fadilities a must. These were complete and convenient. Hotel was comfortable and very friendly. Pleasant entertainment in the courtyard Fri night and Sun night. Our room had an ocean view and (in Nov) a shady balcony. Had a great stay.
